name: Daniel Boone Community Action Agency - CSBG Homeless Program
description: Community Action Agency providing comprehensive social, employment, human, and health services to empower individuals and families toward self-sufficiency. Serves Clay, Jackson, Laurel, Lee, Owsley, and Wolfe counties in Kentucky. Offers housing assistance, homeless services, LIHEAP energy assistance, child care, transportation, emergency services, and community development programs. CSBG (Community Services Block Grant) program provides emergency assistance and support services to low-income individuals and families.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
services: Housing assistance, homeless services, emergency assistance, LIHEAP energy assistance, child care, transportation, case management, community development
eligibility: Low-income individuals and families in Clay, Jackson, Laurel, Lee, Owsley, and Wolfe counties
notes: Main office located in Manchester, KY. This location serves Laurel County. CSBG program provides emergency assistance and support services to help families achieve self-sufficiency.
